original: However, upon Flynn's apparent success in securing sufficient backing to become council president, Arroyo released a statement that acted as an informal concession of sorts, giving strong praise to Flynn's kindness and work ethic, and declaring that he looked forward, "to seeing how he utilizes those great qualities in this leadership role."
simplified: When Flynn got support to become council president, Arroyo sent out a message. || The message was an informal concession that praised Flynn’s kindness and work ethic. || It also said that he looked forward, "to seeing how he utilizes those great qualities in this leadership role."

original: Unlike the first film adaptation, in which director Samuel Fuller entirely wrote out the character of Gary, replaced Seberg with a younger fictional actress, and recast the story as a horror film centred on the dog itself, Barbeau-Lavalette remained more faithful to the original book.
simplified: Unlike the first film adaptation, which contained many changes, Barbeau-Lavalette’s film remained more faithful to the book.

original: Blogger DJ Akademiks held a three-hour stream in honor of Takeoff, in which he analyzed videos from the moment of the murder of Kirshnik, and also called for fighting the ideology of violence in hip-hop, including stop imitating rappers YNW Melly and Tay-K, who were convicted of murder.
simplified: The blogger DJ Akademiks held a three hour stream to honor Takeoff, where he analyzed videos from the moment of Takeoff’s murder. || He also said we have to fight violence in hip-hop, and that we should not copy rappers like YNW Melly and Tay-K, who were murderers.

simplified: Blogger DJ Akademiks held a three-hour stream in honor of Takeoff, in which he analyzed videos from the moment of the murder of Kirshnik, and also called for people to stop copying rappers who were convicted of murder, including YNW Melly and Tay-K.

simplified: Blogger DJ Akademiks held a three-hour long stream to honor Takeoff. || In this stream, he analyzed videos from the moment of Kirshnik’s murder. || He also asked people to challenge the use of violence in hip-hop and to stop copying rappers like YNW Melly and Tay-K who were convicted of murder.

original: The sitcom series features the story of Abi (played by Bolu Essien) who secures a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos, although she had a rough start with her superior, she soon got an opportunity to shine at work when she was promoted to become the acting manager after the manager traveled to another branch.
simplified: The sitcom series features the story of Abi (played by Bolu Essien) who secures a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos, although she had a rough start with her manager, she soon got a chance to show off her talent when she was promoted to become the acting manager of the agency.

original: The film stars Julie Ledru as Julia, a young woman living in social housing who has a poor relationship with her mother; passionate about the sport of motocross, she tries to gain the opportunity to participate in the sport by posing as a buyer on shopping websites so that she can take bikes out for test rides.
simplified: The movie stars Julie Ledru as Julia, a young woman living in social housing who has a poor relationship with her mother. || She tries to gain the opportunity to participate in the sport by posing as a buyer on shopping websites so that she can take bikes out for test rides.

simplified: Julie Ledru portrays Julia in the film; Julia lives in public housing and her relationship with her mother is strained. || She loves motocross and will do whatever it takes to try it out. || To this end, she pretends to be a buyer on shopping websites in order to take bikes out for test rides.
